---@class SetUpTeamNode:ProcessNodeBase
local SetUpTeamNode = SimpleClassUtil:class(ProcessNodeBase)

function SetUpTeamNode:initialize(tree,index,battleData,battleTimes)

    ---@type MainBattleProcessTree
    self._tree = tree
    ---@type number
    self._index = index

    self._data = battleData

    self._battleTimes = battleTimes
end

function SetUpTeamNode:onStart()
    ---@type MainBattleProcessTree
    local _tree = self._tree
    if  _tree._blackBoard._teamList == nil then
        _tree._blackBoard._teamList = {}
    end

    SetUpTeamProxy:OpenSetUpTeamView({
        battleTimes = self._battleTimes,
        teamType = Enum_Battle.BattleTeamType.MainTeam,
        data = self._data,
        node = self,
    })

end

function SetUpTeamNode:toLoadAsset(loadData)

end

function SetUpTeamNode:onUpdate()

end

function SetUpTeamNode:onEnd()

end

function SetUpTeamNode:onExit()
    -----@type MainBattleProcessTree
    --local _tree = self._tree
    --_tree._battleTeam:destroy()
end

return SetUpTeamNode
